unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing the Likes?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Seeing the Likes?**

unnormalised: Chai pe charcha about your influencer campaign’s success? Hold up! Experts are saying follower analytics are the key to knowing if your investment is actually paying off, especially if you're aiming for that 'Made in India' vibe.
normalised: Chai pe charcha about your influencer campaign’s success? Hold up! Experts are saying follower analytics are the key to knowing if your investment is actually paying off, especially if you're aiming for that 'Made in India' vibe.

unnormalised: Turns out, that influencer with 100K followers from Delhi might have a whole lotta ghost followers from, well, nowhere. Dr. Sharma from IIM Bangalore emphasizes deeper dives, beyond just vanity metrics.
normalised: Turns out, that influencer with one hundred thousand followers from Delhi might have a whole lot of ghost followers from, well, nowhere. Doctor Sharma from I I M Bangalore emphasizes deeper dives, beyond just vanity metrics.

unnormalised: Forget blindly chasing follower counts! Look at engagement rate, audience demographics (are they even from India?), and the quality of comments. Are they raving about your brand's new kurta design or just dropping generic emojis?
normalised: Forget blindly chasing follower counts! Look at engagement rate, audience demographics (are they even from India?), and the quality of comments. Are they raving about your brand's new kurta design or just dropping generic emojis?

unnormalised: Tools like SocialBlade & Heepsy can help you unearth the real deal. Knowing that 80% of your target audience lives within a 500 km radius of Mumbai is way more valuable than a million fake followers. Think local, act social, and measure smart.
normalised: Tools like SocialBlade and Heepsy can help you unearth the real deal. Knowing that eighty percent of your target audience lives within a five hundred kilometer radius of Mumbai is way more valuable than a million fake followers. Think local, act social, and measure smart.

unnormalised: So, before splurging Rs. 5 Lakh on your next campaign targeting that 2000 sq ft Delhi apartment owner, do your analytics homework. It's all about genuine connections, yaar!
normalised: So, before splurging rupee five lakh on your next campaign targeting that two thousand square feet Delhi apartment owner, do your analytics homework. It's all about genuine connections, yaar!
